long_description: Very lightweight and perfect for hiking for your turns in the sidecountry, the Giro Montane(TM) Snow Helmet offers cooling airflow, solid styling and a great fit. In-mold technology bonds the helmet's tough outer microshell to the internal expanded polystyrene (EPS) liner, creating a light, cool and strong helmet. 12 vents move cool, fresh air through the helmet while radiating heat and stale air out. Fine-tune the airflow using 2 low-profile Thermostat(TM) control buttons located on the outside of the helmet; buttons open and close vents. Vent placed over the center vent of goggles reduces internal fogging and maintains an integrated fit. Very lightweight fit system adjusts tightness with an easy-to-use racheting dial; you can also adjust the fore-aft tilt of the helmet using 1 hand. Minimalist goggle-keeper cord doubles as a handy attachment system for your pack; delploy cord from inside of helmet and clip to pack using the built-in carabiner. Giro Montane Snow Helmet accommodates TuneUps audio systems, sold separately. This snow helmet complies with ASTM F 2040 and/or CE EN 1077 alpine ski and snowboard helmet safety standards.
